name: CFX PCR Analysis
summary: A PCRD file is a polymerase chain reaction (PCR) analysis created by a Bio-Rad real-time PCR machine. It contains data recorded during the PCR process, which can be visualized in graph, chart, and tabular formats. Depending on what version of Bio-Rad software created a PCRD file, it may be saved in the XML format or as an encrypted archive.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
